products.name: Sony 60" 1080p LED Smart TV (KDL60R510A) - Black Gloss
products.shortDescription: Enjoy an incredible big screen picture in any room in your house with this Sony 60" KDL60R510A LED TV. Boasting Full HD 1080p resolution for amazing, lifelike images and convenient, quick access to all your favourite content, this TV is the perfect addition to your home theatre experience.

products.name: Dell Inspiron 15.6" Laptop - Silver (Intel Core i7-4510U / 1TB HDD / 8GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: With the Dell Inspiron 15, you'll experience the innovation of modern technology. Featuring a sleeker design, the Inspiron 15 is thinner and lighter than previous models and brushed with an elegant aluminum finish. You'll also enjoy it for a longer period of time, with a single battery charge lasting more than seven hours.

products.name: ASUS X Series 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Dual-Core Celeron N2830/500GB HDD/4GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy multitasking power in a sophisticated, ergonomically-designed laptop. Home to a reliable Intel Celeron processor and boasting SonicMaster Lite audio technology for amazing sound whether you're watching a movie or listening to music, this 15.6" ASUS X Series laptop can take on your everyday computing tasks and entertainment without a hitch.

products.name: Xbox One 500GB Console with Kinect - Microsoft Refurbished
products.shortDescription: * Microsoft Certified Refurbished. SAVINGS reflect a comparison price to a $499.99 non-refurbished Xbox One + KinectThe Xbox One console with Kinect and wireless controller is an all-in-one entertainment powerhouse that takes your games, live TV, movies, sports, and music to a whole other level. Using cutting-edge hardware, Xbox One has the power and performance to play hit games, as well as the ability to switch between multiple

products.name: Canon Rebel T5 18MP DSLR Camera With EF-S 18-55mm IS, EF 75-300mm Lenses & DSLR Bag
products.shortDescription: The Canon EOS Rebel T5 bundle is ideal for families, budding photo enthusiasts and first-time SLR users. The camera offers helpful shooting modes and convenient creative options to make capturing photos and movies straightforward and enjoyable. The powerful 18MP CMOS image sensor and DIGIC 4 image processor produce dazzling images and recordings.

products.name: Lenovo G50 15.6" Laptop - Black (AMD A6-6310 / 1TB HDD / 8GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: The 15.6" Lenovo G50 is perfect for everyday use. Loaded with a host of features including a quad-core AMD processor, HD graphics, an integrated DVD drive, and Dolby Audio-certified stereo speakers, you'll enjoy a full multimedia experience whether you're at home or on the go.

products.name: Google Chromecast
products.shortDescription: Everything you love, now on your TV. Chromecast is the easy way to enjoy online video and music on your TV. It's a thumb-sized media streaming device that plugs into the HDMI  port on your TV. Set it up with a simple mobile app, then send your favourite online shows, movies, music and more to your TV using your smartphone, tablet or laptop.

products.name: ASUS F Series 15.6" Laptop - Dark Grey (Intel Core i7-4500u/750GB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1) - English
products.shortDescription: ASUS F Series notebooks are designed for people from all walks of life, from students to burgeoning entrepreneurs. A dual-core processor provides multitasking power to handle all your open apps, and SonicMaster technology with ASUS AudioWizard provides high quality, omnidimensional sound for immersive gaming and entertainment.

products.name: LG 40" 4K Ultra HD 120Hz LED Smart TV (40UB8000) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your favourite shows, movies and video games in amazing Ultra HD quality with the LG 40UB8000 40" 4K TV. UHD picture quality offers four times the resolution of 1080p Full HD, while upscaling technology enhances whatever you're watching to near-Ultra HD quality. WiFi connectivity offers convenient access to premium online content.

products.name: HP 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Celeron N2840 / 500GB HDD / 4GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: The thin HP 15-F018CA laptop offers all the features you need to carry out daily computing tasks on the go. Weighing about five pounds, it houses a full-sized island-style keyboard for typing ease, and its 15.6" display is great for watching HD content, or editing photos and videos.

products.name: Nintendo Wii U 32GB Super Mario 3D World Deluxe Set
products.shortDescription: Enjoy Nintendo classics and exciting new games on the Wii U Deluxe Super Mario 3D World. This 32GB Wii U Console and Wii U GamePad features stunning graphics in up to Full HD resolution, the ability to browse the Internet and connect with other Wii U owners and share Mii characters with people around the world.

products.name: Acer Aspire E15 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Pentium processor N3530/1TB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Stay connected with Acer's Aspire E15, a lightweight but powerful notebook designed to tackle everyday tasks with efficiency and ease. Click through Windows 8 live tiles to access your whopping 1TB worth of photos and files, stream video from WiFi or Bluetooth to its vibrant 15.6" monitor, or connect to an HDTV for a cinematic experience.

products.name: LG 50" 1080p 120Hz LED TV - Silver (50LB5900)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy clear, beautiful visuals with stunning colour quality and enriched detail with the LG LB5900 50-inch TV.  With Full HD 1080p resolution, your HD channels and Blu-ray movies look lifelike, while Motion Clarity Index 240 ensures fast-moving action films, video games or sports appear crystal clear.

products.name: Acer Iconia One 7" 16GB Android 4.2 Tablet with Intel Atom Z2560 Processor - Black
products.shortDescription: Made to fit easily in your hand, the Acer Iconia One 7 tablet has everything you need for browsing, communicating, travelling and shopping. Enjoy brilliant images with wide viewing angles, and tap your way through mobile games, apps and websites. It comes with the Android Jelly Bean OS for seamless multitasking and access to Google Play.

products.name: HP Stream S7-5701CA 7" 32GB Windows 8.1 Tablet With Intel Atom Z3735G Processor - Black Licorice
products.shortDescription: Stay on top of your digital world, whether for work or play, with the HP Stream 7 tablet. Equipped with a 4th Gen Intel processor and 1GB of RAM, this seven-inch tablet houses the power you need to carry out daily computing tasks while on the go. Access content from the cloud with Office 365 and enjoy an intuitive Windows 8.1 interface.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 10.1" 16GB Android 4.4 Tablet With 1.2 GHz Quad-Core Processor - White
products.shortDescription: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 10-inch tablet is perfect for entertainment at home and on the go. With MHL capability, you can connect the tablet to your HDTV to enjoy multimedia content on the big screen. A 1.2GHz dual-core processor keeps things running smoothly so downloading apps, playing games or streaming movies become quick and effortless.

products.name: GoPro HERO Waterproof HD Sports and Helmet Camera - Hero Edition
products.shortDescription: Capture and share all your life's adventures with the GoPro HERO. Shoot crystal clear HD photos and video as you fly through the air on a zipline, dive into the ocean, or bike along a mountain trail. This wearable, gear-mountable, rugged and waterproof camera can go anywhere you can go - and then some.

products.name: Dell Inspiron i3531 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Pentium N3530/500GB HDD/4GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Revel in every movie, photo, game, and more with the Dell Inspiron 15 laptop's vibrant 15.6" HD screen plus the power of an Intel Pentium processor, 4GB RAM, and spacious 500GB hard drive. Designed for multimedia enjoyment, this powerful laptop was built to last as well as perform.

products.name: Samsung 55" 1080p 120Hz LED Smart TV (UN55H6350AFXZC) - Black
products.shortDescription: Be smart about how you spend your spare time. With this 55" Samsung Smart TV at the hub of your home entertainment system, you've got the world of entertainment on lock. Access apps, social accounts, online content and all your device files through a streamlined and powerful quad-core system that wirelessly drives your content to display in 1080p.

products.name: Acer 11.6" Chomebook - White (Intel Celeron N2830 / 16GB eMMC / 2GB RAM / Chrome OS)
products.shortDescription: Running on the speedy and responsive Chrome OS, the Acer Chromebook 11 makes it easy to work and play while on the go. With up to an 8.5-hour battery life and wireless AC connectivity, you can access and share protected content across various devices anytime. Enjoy your Chromebook outside in sunlight thanks to an 11.6" anti-glare display.

products.name: Acer Switch 10 10.1" 32GB  Windows 8.1 Tablet With Intel AtomTM Z3735F Quad-Core Processor - Silver
products.shortDescription: This Acer Aspire Switch 10 tablet's Zero Air Gap and LumiFlex technologies allow you to clearly view visuals on the 10.1" multitouch screen while you're outside. The Snap Hinge enables smooth transitioning between 4 usage modes.

products.name: Apple iPad mini 16GB With Wi-Fi - White
products.shortDescription: iPad mini features a beautiful 7.9-inch display, iSight and FaceTime cameras, the A5 chip, ultrafast wireless, and up to 10 hours of battery life*. And over 300,000 apps on the App Store made for iPad also work with iPad mini**. So it's an iPad in every way, shape, and slightly smaller form.

products.name: GoPro HERO4 Waterproof HD Sports and Helmet Camera - Silver Edition
products.shortDescription: As the first ever GoPro with a built-in touch display, the GoPro HERO4 Silver, lets you capture the world in an all-new way. This camera features professional-quality video and images with 1080p60 and 720p120 video, and 12MP photos at a stunning 30 frames per second, as well as a ton of accessories.

products.name: Samsung 290W Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer (HW-H430/ZC)
products.shortDescription: Sporting 290 watts of vibrant, reverberating sound, the wall-mountable Samsung H430 sound bar connects seamlessly with your Samsung TV. Bluetooth wireless technology, coupled with Samsung's TV SoundConnect, lets you wirelessly connect your smartphone and your television straight into the sound bar.

products.name: Fitbit Charge Fitness Tracker (FB404BKL-CAN) - Large - Black
products.shortDescription: Setting fitness goals is one thing, but staying motivated poses a bigger challenge. With the Fitbit Charge wristband tracker, you don't have to worry about the details. It monitors activity like steps taken, calories burned and active minutes, as well as sleep duration and quality. The comfy, textured band is designed for continuous wear.

products.name: Misfit Flash Wireless Activity & Sleep Tracker - Onyx
products.shortDescription: Get fit and stay motivated no matter what you're doing during the day with the Misfit Flash. It measures a wide variety of activities, from walking to sports, as well as sleep, and syncs with your smartphone so you can see the big fitness picture. With 30-metre waterproofing, this handy device can tag along while you're swimming or running outdoors.

products.name: Dell Inspiron i3542 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Pentium 3558U Processor/500GB HDD/4GB RAM)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy a multimedia experience with this Dell Inspiron i3542 laptop. Powered by a dual-core Intel Pentium 3558U processor and 4GB RAM, it has the functionality you need for your daily tasks and entertainment needs.

products.name: Samsung 50" 4K Ultra HD 60Hz LED Smart TV (UN50HU6830AFXZC)
products.shortDescription: This 50" Samsung HU6830 4K UHD TV will boost your home-cinema viewing experience. Proprietary upscaling technology and a unique 4-step process gives Full HD, HD, and lower resolution content  stunning, UHD-like clarity. The combination of a powerful quad-core processor and smart capabilities allows you to watch live TV and browse the web at the same time.

products.name: Samsung 55" 4K Ultra HD 120Hz Curved LED Smart TV (UN55HU7250FXZC) - Black
products.shortDescription: Watch cinema-quality graphics at the comfort of your own home with the Samsung 55-inch 55HU7250F curved UHD TV. The curved design delivers better viewing angles, and with 4K resolution, every scene comes to life. Follow fast-action shots closely thanks to a 960 Clear Motion Rate that ensures quick motion appears clear and detailed.

products.name: Xbox One 500GB Assassin's Creed Unity Bundle
products.shortDescription: • Experience the immersive gameplay and incredible graphics of Xbox One with this Xbox One Console Bundle with Assassin's Creed Unity and Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag. This all-in-one entertainment console connects you to your favourite games, TV shows, live events, as well as your friends, family and fellow gamers. Assassin's Creed Unity digital code can only be activated on November 11.

products.name: Dynex 50" 1080p 60Hz LED TV (DX-50D510NA15) - Black
products.shortDescription: Create a cinematic experience right at home with a Dynex DLED television. Rich and vibrant colours, deep black and vivid whites ensure your sports, music videos and Blu-ray movies display in lifelike Full HD crystal clarity, while an array of connectivity options including USB and HDMI help you expand and enhance your home theatre capabilities.

products.name: Seagate Backup Plus 1.5TB 2.5" Portable External Hard Drive (STDR1500101)
products.shortDescription: Back up all your important data easily with the Seagate Backup Plus. Featuring USB 3.0 connectivity, the sleek metal design keeps your digital life safe and sound, whether from your computer, mobile device, or even the cloud.
